statements: UPDATE supplier_performance SET total_orders = 100, total_deliveries = 90 WHERE supplier_id = 1
UPDATE supplier_performance SET total_deliveries = 95, late_deliveries = 5 WHERE supplier_id = 2
UPDATE supplier_performance SET total_orders = total_orders + 10, total_deliveries = 100 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE supplier_performance SET late_deliveries = 5, total_deliveries = total_deliveries - 10 WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE supplier_performance_data SET total_orders = 100, order_fulfillment_rate = 0.95 WHERE supplier_id = 123;
UPDATE vendor_management_data SET total_contracts = 50, contract_expiry_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE vendor_id = 456;
UPDATE supplier_performance_data SET order_fulfillment_rate = 0.95, total_orders = total_orders + 10 WHERE supplier_id = 12345;
UPDATE vendor_management_data SET contract_expiry_date = '2022-12-31', total_contracts = total_contracts - 5 WHERE vendor_id = 54321;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_location='New York' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE products SET product_name='New Product', supplier_id=2 WHERE product_id=5;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier Name' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE performance_data SET performance_rating = 5, performance_description = 'Improved performance' WHERE data_id = 3;
